body.setup: You know, if you put 1M monkeys in front of 1M computers, eventually one of them will write a functional node.js script.
body.punchline: The rest will write Perl scripts.

body.setup: How many programmers does it take to screw in a lightbulb?
What do you call it when you have to roll back to a previous release of your Single-Page App?
Why do programmers always fare so poorly when they are near an open flame?
body.punchline: Their first instinct is to halt and catch fire.

body.setup: My roommate always keeps the breakfast potatoes locked up in the outdoor freezer.
body.punchline: He says it's a secure hash

body.setup: Apparently my system administrator thinks he's a player...
body.punchline: He's always sliding into my VM's

body.setup: I once had a Bot companion, but they dumped me with nothing but a deprecation warning...
body.punchline: It was a heart breaking change.

body.setup: What does an average developer have in common with Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson?
body.punchline: Nothing. Literally not a single thing.
